title: Bug 18163 - Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163 - Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
OB: When using Ctrl+M (Add Import), nothing happens when there is trailing whitespace within the selection.
EB: Instead of showing "Node", it should show "Node" when the selection is made using "Shift + Ctrl + Right".
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the code editor.
2. Select a line or block of code that contains trailing whitespace.
3. Use the shortcut Ctrl+M to trigger the Add Import feature.
4. Note that nothing happens and the import is not added.
